skills.HEADLINE: My Skills
skills.SUBTITLE: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

portfolio.HEADLINE: Portfolio
portfolio.SUBTITLE: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
portfolio.JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.SHARKIE: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
portfolio.SIMPLE_CRM: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.
portfolio.POKEDEX: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
portfolio.CRYPTO_CONVERTER: Simple currency converter based on a public API displaying exchange rate charts.

contact.HEADLINE: Contact
contact.INFO_TEXT: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.FORM_CHECKBOX_PART2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined
